user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication
epics.summary: Implement secure login using multi-factor authentication for all users
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system that supports multi-factor authentication (MFA) for secure access to the self-service portal. This includes password protection, OTP delivery (via SMS or email), biometric authentication where applicable, and secure session management. The system will comply with banking security standards and ensure data confidentiality, integrity, and availability while protecting against unauthorized access.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface Design
epics.summary: Design and develop a responsive, user-friendly portal for cross-device accessibility
epics.description: Create a modern, responsive web interface offering consistent usability across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. This epic focuses on building adaptive layouts, ensuring accessibility compliance, optimizing performance across screen resolutions, and integrating intuitive navigation to support seamless user interaction regardless of device or platform.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Management
epics.summary: Develop a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking information
epics.description: Provide users with a personalized dashboard displaying their accounts, balances, and available banking products based on their profile and eligibility. It will also allow management of personal profile data, update of preferences, and quick navigation to linked functionalities. Custom product recommendations and alerts will be integrated based on customer data and activity.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable online initiation of account opening and service requests with guided workflows
epics.description: Develop end-to-end workflows allowing customers to open new accounts, apply for services, and modify existing products directly through the portal. The workflows will ensure ease of use with minimal steps, data validation, and guided interactions. Integration with internal banking systems will automate form processing, routing, and internal follow-ups to reduce manual effort.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notification System
epics.summary: Provide real-time tracking of requests with email and in-portal notifications
epics.description: Implement a real-time status tracking system for users to monitor their application or service request progress. Automated status updates will be delivered through the dashboard and email notifications. This will include event-driven architecture supporting queue-based messaging for request lifecycle events and confirmation prompts for completed transactions.

epics.title: Document Upload and Draft Saving Functionality
epics.summary: Allow users to upload documents securely and resume incomplete requests
epics.description: Enable customers to upload mandatory identity, address, and financial documents securely during application processes. The functionality will include encryption for file storage, drag-and-drop support, and file validation rules. Additionally, users can save incomplete workflows as drafts and return later to complete or edit them, improving flexibility and convenience.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with existing core banking systems
epics.description: Establish secure integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system through APIs or middleware. This will allow real-time synchronization of customer data, product availability, and transactional updates while maintaining data consistency. The integration layer will handle authentication, error responses, and data transformation to align with the bank’s existing infrastructure.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Implementation
epics.summary: Implement dynamic role-based access control to regulate user privileges
epics.description: Deploy a role-based access control mechanism to ensure users can only access features and data aligned with their profiles and authorization levels. This will include defining roles and permissions for customers, bank staff, and admins. The RBAC system will integrate with the authentication module to enforce strict access boundaries and ensure compliance with security policies and regulatory standards.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain a detailed history of all user and system interactions
epics.description: Implement an audit trail and interaction history system to log all user actions such as logins, service requests, modifications, and document submissions. This ensures full traceability for compliance, customer support, and system monitoring. Users can view a summary of their transaction and request history, while administrators can access detailed logs for regulatory audits.

epics.title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Create a separate database instance optimized for portal performance
epics.description: Develop a dedicated database architecture to support portal operations while maintaining independence from the core banking database. This setup will include caching, indexing, and parallel query optimization to ensure low latency and high reliability. The database will store transactional data, user interactions, documents, and audit logs in compliance with data governance standards.

epics.title: Comprehensive Data Security and Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with regulatory standards
epics.description: Implement advanced data security measures, including encryption at rest and in transit, intrusion detection, firewalls, and secure token-based APIs. Compliance with regional and international financial regulations such as GDPR, PCI-DSS, and local data privacy standards will be ensured. Security audits, vulnerability scans, and continuous monitoring will protect user and financial assets from threats.

user_stories.title: Implement password protection for secure login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to have password protection for my account, so that I can prevent unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The password must be alphanumeric, include special characters, and be at least 8 characters long.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must set a password that meets complexity requirements. 2. The system should prompt users to change their passwords periodically.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user is registering, When they set a password, Then the password must meet complexity requirements.

user_stories.title: Enable OTP delivery via SMS or email
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive a one-time password (OTP) via SMS or email, so that I can authenticate my identity during login.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: OTP should be a 6-digit randomized number valid for a short period.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must receive the OTP within a few seconds via SMS or email. 2. The OTP must expire within 5 minutes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user requests an OTP, When the OTP is sent, Then the user should receive it within 30 seconds.

user_stories.title: Integrate biometric authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use biometric authentication, so that I can securely access my account without manually entering passwords.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Biometric data should be securely encrypted and comply with privacy regulations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must be able to register their biometric data. 2. Users can log in using their biometric data.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user has registered biometrics, When they attempt to log in, Then the system should authenticate them using biometrics.

user_stories.title: Design adaptive layouts for multiple devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal layout to adapt to my device, so that I have an optimal viewing experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The layout must adjust seamlessly to screen sizes using responsive design techniques.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal must display appropriately on all device types.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user accesses the portal, When they switch devices, Then the layout should adapt accordingly.

user_stories.title: Ensure accessibility compliance
user_stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want the portal to be accessible, so that I can use it without barriers.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The portal must comply with WCAG standards for accessibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal must meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a person with disabilities tries to use the portal, When they navigate, Then they should be able to do so without barriers.

user_stories.title: Optimize performance for all screen resolutions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to perform optimally, so that I have a smooth experience regardless of my screen resolution.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The portal must load within 2 seconds on all devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal must load quickly across all screen resolutions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user loads the portal, When viewed on any device, Then it should load in under 2 seconds.

user_stories.title: Display personalized banking information
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see my banking information on a dashboard, so that I can easily manage my accounts.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must display accounts, balances, and product recommendations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must see their account details accurately. 2. Product recommendations should be relevant.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user logs in, When their profile loads, Then their personalized details should be displayed.

user_stories.title: Allow management of personal profile data
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to update my personal profile data, so that my account information remains current.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to update personal and contact information.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must be able to update and save changes to their profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user accesses their profile, When they make edits, Then the updated data should be saved successfully.

user_stories.title: Integrate custom product recommendations
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive custom product recommendations, so that I can benefit from products suited to my needs.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Recommendations should be generated based on user data and activity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must receive relevant recommendations. 2. The recommendations should update based on user activity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a user views their dashboard, When logged in, Then they should see product recommendations based on their activity.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Develop end-to-end workflow for new account opening
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I don't need to visit the bank.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The workflow must guide users step-by-step with data validation at each step.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must complete the account opening process with minimal steps. 2. Data must be validated at each step.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a customer starts the workflow, When they follow the steps, Then they should be able to open a new account online.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Enable modification of existing products
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking products online, so that I can manage my services without visiting a branch.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The modification workflows must be simple and require minimal steps.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must be able to modify their products with ease. 2. All changes should be validated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a customer accesses their products, When they choose to modify, Then the changes should be processed accurately.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Integrate automated account application processing
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want my account application to be processed automatically, so that I can receive timely approvals.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must automate form processing, routing, and internal follow-ups.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Account applications must be processed automatically. 2. Internal follow-ups should be minimized.
user_stories.test_cases: Given that a customer submits an application, When the system processes it, Then it should be handled automatically with minimal manual intervention.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture diagram outlines an Azure-based self-service portal for bank customers, incorporating components for user authentication, frontend and backend services, database storage, system integration, monitoring, security, notifications, responsive design, data backup, disaster recovery, and DevOps.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been validated and adjusted to ensure all nodes and edges are consistent, with placeholders added for any missing references. The diagram represents a secure, reliable, and user-friendly self-service banking portal using Azure services, with group hierarchies and visual styles preserved. Architecture quality rating: High.

data.label: Frontend (Azure App Service, Azure Front Door)
